tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NN Someone)) (VP (VBZ needs) (S (VP (TO to) (VP (VB invent) (NP (DT a) (NN dream) (NN recorder)))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [needs/VBZ nsubj>Someone/NN xcomp>[invent/VB mark>to/TO dobj>[recorder/NN det>a/DT compound>dream/NN]] punct>./.]

tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (VB Cause) (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VB be) (ADJP (RB so) (JJ sad)) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB when)) (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VB forget) (NP (PRP$ my) (NNS dreams))))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Cause/VB dobj>I/PRP dep>[sad/JJ cop>be/VB advmod>so/RB advcl>[forget/VB advmod>when/WRB nsubj>I/PRP dobj>[dreams/NNS nmod:poss>my/PRP$]]] punct>./.]
